title: Fun Lovin' Criminals - Come Find Yourself + 100% Colombia
description:
1. Fun Lovin&#039; Criminals - Come Find Yourself (1996)


The Fun Lovin&#039; Criminals made something that I guarantee you haven&#039;t quite heard before. If you go back to &#039;96 you may recall some hit singles "Scooby Snacks" & "Fun Lovin&#039; Criminal", two hip-hopish songs that crossed into the alternative rock mainstream at the time.
FLC is made up of 3 New Yorkers and you can tell how the NYC life is injected into their song stlyes of hip-hop beats and lyrics with a touch of dark bluesy rock. The best way I can describe this music when you hear it is... it makes you wanna kick-back and chill.


01. The Fun Lovin&#039; Criminal                       
02. Passive Aggressive                            
03. The Grave And The Constant                    
04. Scooby Snacks                                 
05. Smoke &#039;em                                     
06. Bombin&#039; The L                                 
07. I Can&#039;t Get With That                         
08. King Of New York                              
09. We Have All The Time In The World             
10. Bear Hug                                      
11. Come Find Yourself                            
12. Crime & Punishment                            
13. Methadonia                                    
14. I Can&#039;t Get With That (Schmoove Version)      
15. Coney Island Girl         





2. Fun Lovin&#039; Criminals - 100% Colombian (1999)


"100% Colombian" took a little bit to get used to, cause rythems are a little jazzier and slower here. But you&#039;ll love it quickly. Besides, you get these bursts of hip-hop/rock/blues anthems like "All For Self", you hear it and you just feel like your the boss.


01. Up On The Hill                                
02. Love Unlimited                                
03. The View Belongs To Everyone                  
04. Korean Bodega                                 
05. Back On The Block                             
06. 10Th Street                                   
07. Sugar                                         
08. South Side                                    
09. We Are All Very Worried About You             
10. All For Self                                  
11. All My Time Is Gone                           
12. Big Night Out                                 
13. Mini Bar Blues                                
14. Fisty Nuts (Hidden Track)
